text: Wellington Cézar Alves de Lima (born December 21, 1993 in Recife), known as Wellington, is a Brazilian football midfield who currently plays for Botafogo PB.Wellington revela sonho realizado diante de sequência no Santa ==Honours== ;Santa Cruz *Campeonato Pernambucano: 2013, 2015 *Campeonato Brasileiro Série C: 2013 Copa do Nordeste|2016 ==References== ==External links== * Wellington at Ogol * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Santa Cruz Futebol Clube players Category:Botafogo Futebol Clube (PB) players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Wellington Cézar Alves de Lima
